name: rhinovirus
message: Oh no, you've caught a cold! How chilling.

name: drunk
message: You swear to drunk you're not dog... Nope, you're definitely drunk.

name: influenza
message: It's a plane! It's a bird! It's...avian flu? Swine flu? In the end, it's all human flu.

name: cancer
message: The Internet is finally correct. You've unfortunately developed cancer.

name: a broken limb
message: Everything hurts and nothing feels good, but at least you're on the mend. Mending bones.

name: depression
message: you're now depressed. i don't have a clever joke for this.

name: anxiety
message: YOU'RE IN A GLASS CASE OF EMOTION!!!!! NOTHING IS OKAY!!!!!

name: psychosis
message: Hey-ey-ey-ey, I said hey! What's going on? Is this the real life?? Is this just fantasy???

name: mania
message: EVERYTHING IS AWESOME! EVERYTHING IS COOL WHEN YOU'RE PART OF A TEAM! (IT'S NOT. HELP.)

name: allergies
message: Congratulations, your immune system works! Too well! But not so well it's killing you!

name: dysentery
message: You have dysentery. (This entire game was created so I could reference this meme.)
